custom.accept-rules-message: Sample message that user has to type in order to grant access

messages.registration: Thanks for registering to our game through discord. Your private token is `$token`. To complete your registration, connect to any game server in mw2/bo2 and enter this command: `!discord $token`
messages.registrationComplete: You have successfully registered yourself to our discord. Game: `$game`, Player Name `$playerName`
